Package weka.gui

Class ColorEditor

java.lang.Object
weka.gui.ColorEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyEditor
public class ColorEditor extends Object implements PropertyEditor
A property editor for colors that uses JColorChooser as the underlying editor.
Version:
$Revision: $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
